test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Algorithm Validation
test_cases.objective: To verify that the custom batch release decision engine correctly implements proprietary algorithms for multi-parameter batch disposition decisions.

test_steps.action: Load test batch data into the system
test_steps.expected_result: Batch data successfully loaded and visible in the system

test_steps.action: Execute batch release decision engine
test_steps.expected_result: Batch decision completed within 5 minutes

test_steps.action: Verify decision against expected outcome
test_steps.expected_result: Decision matches expected outcome based on proprietary algorithms

acceptance_criteria: Batch decision completed within 5 minutes
Decision matches expected outcome
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity throughout the decision process

test_cases.test_name: Real-Time Data Integration Layer Validation
test_cases.objective: To validate the custom data integration layer's ability to connect disparate systems and maintain sub-second latency for critical parameters.

test_steps.action: Simulate real-time LIMS result polling
test_steps.expected_result: LIMS results successfully polled and integrated into the system

test_steps.action: Simulate manufacturing data extraction from MES platforms
test_steps.expected_result: Manufacturing data successfully extracted and integrated into the system

test_steps.action: Verify data integration latency
test_steps.expected_result: Data integration maintains sub-second latency for critical parameters

acceptance_criteria: Data integration maintains sub-second latency
All data sources successfully integrated
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity throughout the integration process

test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Algorithm Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the proprietary batch release decision engine correctly processes multi-dimensional quality parameters using custom mathematical models

test_steps.action: Load test batch with known quality parameters into the system
test_steps.expected_result: System successfully ingests batch data and displays in the interface

test_steps.action: Execute the custom decision engine algorithm on the test batch
test_steps.expected_result: Algorithm completes processing within 5 minutes as specified in URS-BRS-011

test_steps.action: Verify the release decision matches expected outcome based on test parameters
test_steps.expected_result: Decision output aligns with proprietary algorithm specifications and business rules

acceptance_criteria: All test batches processed within 5 minutes
Decision outcomes match expected results for all test cases
No system errors or crashes during processing
data_integrity_requirements: All algorithm inputs and outputs must be captured in audit trail
No manual overrides permitted during test execution
Decision logic must be traceable to approved specifications

test_cases.test_name: Real-time Data Integration Layer Performance Testing
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom data integration layer maintains sub-second latency for critical parameters as specified in URS-BRS-013

test_steps.action: Simulate data transmission from LIMS system using test API calls
test_steps.expected_result: Data appears in target system within 1 second as per URS-BRS-013

test_steps.action: Execute concurrent data streams from multiple MES platforms
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains sub-second latency under concurrent load

test_steps.action: Verify data transformation accuracy during high-volume transmission
test_steps.expected_result: All transformed data maintains integrity and matches source values

acceptance_criteria: 95% of data transmissions complete within 1 second
No data loss or corruption during testing
System resources remain within operational limits
data_integrity_requirements: All data transmissions must be logged with timestamps
Data validation must occur at both source and destination
Error handling must preserve original data

test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Algorithm Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the proprietary algorithms in the batch release decision engine correctly evaluate multi-dimensional quality parameters and generate accurate release decisions.

test_steps.action: Load test batch data with known quality parameters into the system
test_steps.expected_result: System successfully ingests and processes the test batch data

test_steps.action: Execute the custom batch release decision algorithm
test_steps.expected_result: System generates a release decision within 5 minutes

test_steps.action: Verify the release decision matches expected results based on test data parameters
test_steps.expected_result: Release decision is accurate according to predefined quality thresholds

acceptance_criteria: All test batches are correctly evaluated by the custom algorithms
Release decisions are generated within 5 minutes of data availability
Algorithm outputs match expected results for all test cases
data_integrity_requirements: All algorithm inputs and outputs must be securely logged
Decision logic must be traceable through audit trails

test_cases.test_name: Custom Data Integration Layer Performance Testing
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom data integration layer can handle real-time data polling from multiple systems without performance degradation.
prerequisites: Test systems configured for data extraction

test_steps.action: Configure test scenario with 1000 concurrent batch evaluations
test_steps.expected_result: Test environment successfully prepared with simulated load

test_steps.action: Execute data polling from LIMS, MES, and environmental monitoring systems simultaneously
test_steps.expected_result: All data sources are polled without system failures

test_steps.action: Monitor system performance metrics during peak load
test_steps.expected_result: System maintains sub-second latency for critical parameters

acceptance_criteria: System processes 1000 concurrent batch evaluations without errors
Real-time data integration maintains sub-second latency
No performance degradation observed during peak loads
data_integrity_requirements: All integrated data must maintain original fidelity
Data transfer logs must be complete and accurate

test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Algorithm Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the proprietary batch release decision engine correctly implements multi-dimensional quality parameter evaluation and risk-based scoring
prerequisites: Test environment with deployed custom batch release system
Sample batch data sets with known quality parameters

test_steps.action: Load test batch data with varying quality parameter combinations
test_steps.expected_result: System correctly ingests and processes all test batch data

test_steps.action: Execute proprietary multi-dimensional evaluation algorithm
test_steps.expected_result: System applies custom mathematical models correctly to all parameters

test_steps.action: Verify risk-based release scoring output
test_steps.expected_result: Scores match expected values based on weighted factor analysis

acceptance_criteria: All test batches processed within 5 minutes as per URS-BRS-011
Multi-dimensional evaluation matches expected outcomes for 100% of test cases
Risk scores within ±5% of expected values for all test batches
data_integrity_requirements: All calculations must be traceable and reproducible
Algorithm inputs and outputs must be securely logged

test_cases.test_name: Real-time Data Integration Layer Performance Testing
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom data integration layer meets sub-second latency requirements for critical parameters
prerequisites: Test environment with configured data integration layer
Simulated LIMS and MES systems generating test data

test_steps.action: Configure test to simulate 1000 concurrent batch evaluations
test_steps.expected_result: Test environment ready to simulate full load condition

test_steps.action: Initiate data flow from simulated systems to custom integration layer
test_steps.expected_result: All data streams established and active

test_steps.action: Measure end-to-end latency for critical parameter transmission
test_steps.expected_result: 99% of critical parameters processed in <1 second

acceptance_criteria: Sub-second latency maintained for 99% of critical parameters (URS-BRS-013)
System maintains stable performance under 1000 concurrent evaluations (URS-BRS-012)
No data loss or corruption during high-load conditions
data_integrity_requirements: All transmitted data must maintain integrity throughout process
No data truncation or alteration during high-load conditions

test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Algorithm Validation

test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Algorithm Validation

test_cases.test_name: Custom Real-time Data Integration Layer Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom data integration layer maintains sub-second latency for critical parameters during high-volume operations

test_steps.action: Simulate peak load by generating 1000 concurrent batch evaluation requests
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts all requests without rejection or queuing delays

test_steps.action: Measure data transfer latency from LIMS to decision engine for critical parameters
test_steps.expected_result: All critical parameter transfers complete in <1 second as specified

test_steps.action: Verify custom API maintains stable performance under sustained load
test_steps.expected_result: No performance degradation observed during 30-minute test period

acceptance_criteria: Sub-second latency maintained for 99.9% of critical parameter transfers
No data loss or corruption during high-volume operations
System resources remain within defined thresholds
data_integrity_requirements: All data transfers must be verifiably complete and accurate
No missing or duplicated data points permitted
Timestamp synchronization must be maintained across all systems

test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Functional Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the custom batch release decision engine correctly processes multi-dimensional quality parameters using proprietary algorithms.

test_steps.action: Load test batch data with varying quality parameters into the system.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts and processes the test batch data without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute the custom batch release decision engine with the loaded test data.
test_steps.expected_result: Engine processes the data and generates a release decision within 5 minutes.

test_steps.action: Verify the decision against expected outcomes based on the proprietary algorithms.
test_steps.expected_result: Release decisions match expected outcomes for all test cases.

acceptance_criteria: All test batches are processed within 5 minutes
Release decisions match expected outcomes with 100% accuracy
System logs all processing steps and decisions
data_integrity_requirements: All data transformations must be validated
Decision logic must be traceable and auditable

test_cases.test_name: Custom Data Integration Layer Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the custom data integration layer can handle real-time data polling from multiple sources with sub-second latency.

test_steps.expected_result: Integration layer establishes connections to all sources without errors.

test_steps.action: Measure data transfer latency for critical parameters across all sources.
test_steps.expected_result: All critical parameters are transferred with sub-second latency.

test_steps.action: Verify data integrity after transfer by comparing source and destination data.
test_steps.expected_result: Transferred data matches source data with 100% accuracy.

acceptance_criteria: All data sources are polled with sub-second latency for critical parameters
System maintains stable performance under load
No data corruption or loss occurs during transfer
data_integrity_requirements: All data transfers must be validated for accuracy
Transfer logs must be complete and auditable

test_cases.test_name: Custom Batch Release Decision Engine Algorithm Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the proprietary batch release decision engine correctly processes multi-dimensional quality parameters using custom mathematical models and dynamic specification limits.

test_steps.action: Configure test batch with known quality parameters spanning acceptable and unacceptable ranges
test_steps.expected_result: Test batch configuration is successfully loaded into the system

test_steps.action: Execute the custom batch release decision algorithm on the test batch
test_steps.expected_result: Algorithm completes processing within 5 minutes as specified in URS-BRS-011

test_steps.action: Verify the release decision matches expected outcomes based on the custom mathematical models
test_steps.expected_result: Release decision correctly reflects the weighted factor analysis and risk-based scoring

acceptance_criteria: All test batches are evaluated within 5 minutes
Release decisions match expected outcomes with 100% accuracy
Dynamic specification limits are correctly applied based on historical data
data_integrity_requirements: All algorithm inputs and outputs must be captured in the audit trail
No manual overrides permitted during test execution
Full traceability of decision factors must be maintained

test_cases.test_name: Custom Data Integration Layer Performance Under Load
test_cases.objective: Validate that the custom data integration layer can maintain sub-second latency for critical parameters while processing 1000 concurrent batch evaluations.

test_steps.action: Configure test harness to simulate 1000 concurrent batch evaluation requests
test_steps.expected_result: Test harness successfully initialized with all simulated requests

test_steps.action: Execute load test while monitoring system performance metrics
test_steps.expected_result: System processes all requests without crashing or significant performance degradation

test_steps.action: Verify critical parameter updates maintain sub-second latency during peak load
test_steps.expected_result: 95% of critical parameter updates complete within 900ms as specified in URS-BRS-013

acceptance_criteria: System maintains sub-second latency for 95% of critical parameter updates
No more than 1% error rate during peak load
System recovers to normal operation within 2 minutes after load test completes
data_integrity_requirements: All data transmissions must be verifiably complete and accurate
No data loss permitted during high-load conditions
All performance metrics must be captured in the audit trail
